upcycled_materials: Rewoven Denim Couture - floor-length patchwork gown crafted from reclaimed indigo jeans, copper rivet corsetry, sapphire smoky eye with recycled denim pigment
Sailcloth Trench Ensemble - tailored storm-coat cut from retired regatta sails, braided dock-line belt, wind-swept bronze glow with sea-salt highlighter
Tea-Dyed Lace Reverie - bias-cut slip dress from vintage table linens steeped in botanical dyes, pearl button straps, rose-gold halo blush and dewy lip balm
Silk Sari Renaissance - draped gown woven from retired silk saris backed with organic hemp lining, gilded salvage bangles, kohl-lined eyes with marigold shimmer
Fishing Net Siren - asymmetrical column dress crafted from reclaimed fishing nets over recycled neoprene base, abalone shell cuffs, seafoam shimmer shadow and coral tint
Bicycle Tube Athleisure - tailored catsuit from layered inner tubes with reflective striping, mini pump clutch, graphite highlight with ultraviolet gloss
Canvas Painter's Smock - deconstructed art studio tarps reborn as belted wrap coat with palette-knife fringe, oil-wash eye shadow and brick-red lip stain
Coffee Sack Streetwear - tailored bomber and pleated mini from burlap coffee sacks lined with deadstock satin, espresso contour and café-au-lait nude lip
Seatbelt Weave Column - tonal ombré column dress woven from retired airline seatbelts with anodized buckle obi, aerodynamic winged liner and chrome gloss
Parachute Canopy Couture - voluminous high-low gown from ripstop parachute canopy, harness-inspired bodice, cloud-soft highlight and windswept berry stain
Cork Atelier Ensemble - sculpted peplum jacket pieced from wine cork leather with vine embroidery, earthen amber gaze and merlot velvet lip
Atlas Page Elegance - flowing maxi dress pieced from vintage atlas pages laminated with natural resin, compass rose brooch, sepia-toned eyes with cartographic liner
Silk Tie Cascade - asymmetrical gown constructed from retired silk neckties with patterned yoke, mother-of-pearl buttons, sophisticated contour and burgundy velvet lip
Vintage Sweater Chic - oversized cardigan dress from knitted wool sweaters with cable stitch detailing, tortoiseshell buttons, warm amber glow with cinnamon lip stain
Curtain Silk Reverie - ethereal bias gown from vintage velvet curtains with gold tassel trim, crystal beaded straps, luminous pearl highlight and dusty rose lip
Leather Jacket Remix - structured moto jacket and skirt from reclaimed leather garments with studded accents, smoky quartz eyes and oxblood matte lip
Wool Blanket Boho - layered wrap dress from heirloom wool blankets with fringe edging, wooden bead necklace, earth-toned smokey eye and berry-stained lips
Scarf Silk Symphony - draped tunic and wide-leg pants from collected silk scarves with paisley motifs, gold thread embroidery, warm bronze glow and terracotta lip
Cotton Sheet Simplicity - minimalist shift dress from vintage cotton bedsheets with hand-stitched hems, natural fiber belt, fresh dewy skin and soft nude lip
Maple Syrup Jug Couture - structured blazer from recycled plastic jugs with transparent panels, metallic thread accents, futuristic silver liner and holographic gloss
Book Page Poetry - literary-inspired gown from aged book pages with gold leaf lettering, leather-bound obi, antique gold shadow and crimson lip stain
